title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook the spaghetti in salted boiling water until al dente.
Fry the bacon until crispy.
Whisk eggs with grated Parmesan, salt, and black pepper.
Drain spaghetti and mix immediately with the egg mixture and bacon.
Serve hot with extra Parmesan on top.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken with yogurt and spices for at least 2 hours.
Grill or bake the chicken until cooked through.
In a pan, cook tomato puree with spices and add grilled chicken.
Stir in heavy cream and simmer for 10 minutes.
Serve with rice or naan.
